title: Iekei Tare
steps: Combine the ingredients in a pot, bring to a boil.
Allow to cool and store in refrigerator.
notes: Iekei styles of ramen are notoriously simple tonkotsu shoyu variants that push into the flavor of the cooked soy sauce.
The approach can be used in the same way as the 'Easy Meat Shoyu Tare,' where chashu is soaked in it.
It's really just fortified soy sauce.
Add 30 mL of tare per 350 mL soup.
